# How to use observer

## create your app

```ts
import { useObserver } from 'reev/react'

export const App = () => {
        const [entry, ref] = useObserver()
        return (
                <div ref={ref}>
                        <div>{entry?.isIntersecting ? 'ğŸ‘€' : 'ğŸ˜‘'}</div>
                </div>
        )
}
```

import { useObserver } from 'reev/react'

export const App = () => {
        const [entry, ref] = useObserver()
        return (
                <div ref={ref}>
                        <div>{entry?.isIntersecting ? 'ğŸ‘€' : 'ğŸ˜‘'}</div>
                </div>
        )
}

<App />
